pr_title: KOGITO-1181: [DMN Designer] Default Output value for Decision Table are not persisted

timeline.author: danielzhe

replies.bodyText: Hi @danielzhe there is a public setter for Text that does not do a null check. Therefore it's possible that it could be null although that scenario is probably a bug in it's own right! However I've added a new commit checking that getText() is non-null now too. Thank-you .
replies.author: manstis

timeline.message: KOGITO-1181: [DMN Designer] Default Output value for Decision Table are not persisted
